name: ConditionClinicalStatusActiveRemission
title: Condition Clinical Status (Active / Remission)
description: ValueSet that includes two codes from the HL7 FHIR R4 Condition Clinical Status CodeSystem: 'active' and 'remission'. 'Active' indicates that the subject is currently experiencing the condition, while 'remission' indicates that the condition is not active but there is a risk of recurrence.
